name: Debounce

aliases.name: Config
aliases.comment:
Config contains the debouncing strategy and the message transformation.

This config should be constant and shared between `update` function and `push` function.

aliases.name: Send
aliases.comment:
This function consumes values and send a command.

If you want to postpone sending, return the values back to keep them.
aliases.type: a -> List a -> ( List a, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg )

types.name: Debounce
types.comment:
The state of the debouncer.

It is parameterized with the value type `a`.

types.name: Msg
types.comment: The messages that are used internally.

types.name: Strategy
types.comment: Strategy defines the timing when commands are sent.

values.name: init
values.comment: Initialize the debouncer. Call this from your `init` function.

values.name: later
values.comment: Send command after becomming stable, with given delay time. (a.k.a. Debounce)

values.name: push
values.comment: Push a value into the debouncer.
values.type: Debounce.Config msg -> a -> Debounce.Debounce a -> ( Debounce.Debounce a, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg )

values.name: soon
values.comment:
Send command as soon as it gets ready, with given rate limit. (a.k.a. Throttle)

Note: The first command will be sent immidiately.

values.name: soonAfter
values.comment: Similar to `soon`, but send first command after offset time.

values.name: takeAll
values.comment: Send a command using all the accumulated values.
values.type: (a -> List a -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg) -> Debounce.Send a msg

values.name: takeLast
values.comment: Send a command using the latest value.

values.name: update
values.comment:
This is the component's update function following the Elm Architecture.

e.g. Saving the last value.
```
(debounce, cmd) =
  Debounce.update
    { strategy = Debounce.later (1 * second)
    , transform = DebounceMsg
    }
    (Debounce.takeLast save) -- save : value -> Cmd Msg
    msg
    model.debounce
```
The config should be constant and shared with `push` function.

The sending logic can depend on the current model. If you want to stop sending, return `Cmd.none`.
values.type: Debounce.Config msg -> Debounce.Send a msg -> Debounce.Msg -> Debounce.Debounce a -> ( Debounce.Debounce a, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg )
